attributes.action: levy a one-thousand pound tax on every ticket sold for the Universal Pictures remake of "Drop Dead Fred".
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Universal Pictures plans to remake the 1991 classic film, 'Drop Dead Fred'. Clearly, Mr. Brown ought to prevent the youth of our fine Kingdom being sullied by Russell Brand's vulgar brand of anti-charm. As banning the film is outside the Prime Minister's remit, this massive and prohibitive tax will serve a similar purpose.

Regrettably, at least a few people will be foolish enough to see the film. The revenue raised from ticket sales, then, ought to be directed to funding public screenings of Rik Mayall's original masterpiece.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
